A Lafayette man was arrested after allegedly assaulting a woman in front of her child according to a probable cause affidavit filed Monday PERIOD

Dionne Bailey  reportedly  after drinking all day on Friday at  Eagles Way Drive PERIOD The victim came home after going to Gary for court and was told about the issues Bailey was causing by her child PERIOD Bailey grew upset with the victim after she claimed to believe the child over him and acted aggressively toward the victim according to the affidavit PERIOD

Bailey was then pushed out of the residence but kicked the door open and forced himself back inside PERIOD The victim feared that Bailey would harm her child so she intervened and Bailey and her began fighting PERIOD Dionne pushed the victim down multiple times according to the affidavit but the victim said that she was able to recover because her adrenaline was pumping. lafayette police were dispatched to the residence after they received a call from the child who was screaming that Bailey had jumped on his mother and touched her PERIOD When police arrived the child told police he witnessed Bailey push his mother on the ground and batter her the affidavit states PERIOD

Bailey was arrested and booked in the Tippecanoe County Jail on a charge of domestic battery in the presence of a child less than  years old PERIOD
